document.full_text: huge crowds across yemen demanded on friday that president ali abdullah saleh leave after months of unrest which has put the arab world's poorest country on the brink of an economic meltdown.
document.title: yemen's saleh defies crowds demanding his exit
lines_and_colors: huge crowds across yemen demanded on friday that president ali abdullah saleh leave after months of unrest which has put the arab world's poorest country on the brink of an economic meltdown.
